home.introText: MTEAM blends precision and craftsmanship to shape the future of metalwork — one part, weld or prototype at a time.
home.card1Description: High-precision CNC milling and turning for custom metal parts with industrial accuracy.
home.card2Description: Structural and detailed welding using modern techniques to ensure durability and clean aesthetics.
home.card3Description: Got a weird idea? We'll bring it to life in metal, no matter how odd it sounds.
home.card4Description: Need 5 parts, not 5,000? We've got you covered with flexible production runs.
home.card5Description: We'll help you refine your concept before it hits the machines.
home.card6Description: Whether it's an art piece or an industrial frame, we'll build it from scratch.

card1.name: Custom Bracket
card1.description: Precision CNC-milled steel bracket for industrial use.

card2.name: Welded Frame
card2.description: Sturdy aluminum frame made for architectural projects.

card3.name: Metal Sculpture
card3.description: Artistic piece combining industrial form with expression.

about.heroTitle: Built to Last. Designed to Impress.

heroText.part2: we specialize in high-quality metal furniture that blends durability with bold, modern design.

about.whoText1: Founded in 2021, we've been at the forefront of metal furniture manufacturing for 4 years. From sleek office desks to heavy-duty industrial shelving, our products are crafted for performance and style.
about.whoText2: Every piece we produce reflects our passion for precision engineering and minimalistic design. Made with pride. Built to outlast trends.

feature1.title: 4 Years Experience
feature1.text: Industry leaders in metal craftsmanship since 2021.

feature2.title: 10K+ Units Shipped
feature2.text: Reliable supply chain and large-scale manufacturing.

feature3.title: Eco-Conscious
feature3.text: We prioritize recyclable materials and sustainable processes.

about.ctaText: Let's talk about your next project or explore our catalog.
